name: Cabri 3D Document
summary: Learn about .CG3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CG3 files can be exported for display on the Web if you have the Cabri Web browser plug-in installed. When exported, an .HTML and .PNG file are generated in addition to the CG3 file.

description: 3D image file created by Cabri 3D, an educational program used for teaching three-dimensional geometry; may store lines, planes, and shapes in a 3D space; may also include measurements.
